name: Cause and Effect Test 3
description: Practice Cause and Effect Online Test 3

questions.name: When the fire alarm sounded everyone walked out of the classroom in a quiet line.

options.name: everyone
When
sounded
walked

questions.name:
Statements:
I. The government has recently fixed the fees for professional courses offered by the unaided institutions which are much lower than the fees charged last year.
II. The parents of the aspiring students launched a severe agitation last year protesting against the high fees charged by the unaided institutions.
questions.explanation: The parents' protest against high fees being charged by the institutions led the government to interfere and fix the fees at a more affordable level.

options.name: Statement I is the cause and statement II is its effect
Statement II is the cause and statement I is its effect
Both the statements I and II are independent causes
Both the statements I and II are effects of independent causes

questions.name:
Statements:
I. The meteorological Department has issued a statement mentioning deficient rainfall during monsoon in many parts of the country.
II. The Government has lowered the revised estimated GDP growth from the level of earlier estimates.
questions.explanation: Both the statements I and II are effects of independent causes.

options.name: Statement I is the cause and statement II is its effect.
Statement II is the cause and statement I is its effect.
Both the statements I and II are independent causes.
Both the statements I and II are effects of independent causes.

questions.name: What is the definition of a cause?

options.name: The effect of what happened in a given situation.
What happened in a given situation.
The result of what happened in a given situation.
The reason something happened in a given situation.

questions.name: Read the cause and choose the effect. I ran as fast as I could, passing all the other runners in the race. I wasn't even tired, either.

options.name: I decided to run the last lap of the race again.
I won the race.
I stopped at the store for a snack, since I was ahead of everyone else.
I came in last place in the race.

questions.name: The mother bird gathers dried grass to build her nest.

options.name: mother bird
gathers
Build her next
gathers dried grass

questions.name: The plant died because it did not get enough water. Identify the effect.

options.name: the plant did not get enough water
the plant died
the plant is green
None

questions.name:
Statements:
Importance of Yoga and exercise is being realized by all sections of the society.
There is an increasing awareness about health in the society particularly among middle ages group of people.
questions.explanation: As the awareness about health in the society is increasing particularly among middle-aged group of people, the importance of Yoga and exercise is being realized by all sections of the society.

options.name: Statement I is the cause and statement II is its effect.
Statement II is the cause and statement I is its effect.
Both the statements I and II are independent causes.
Both the statements I and II are effects of independent causes.

questions.name:
Statements:I. There is unprecedented increase in the number of young unemployed in comparison to the previous year.
II. A large number of candidates submitted applications against an advertisement for the post of manager issued by a bank
questions.explanation: An increase in the number of unemployed youth is bound to draw in huge crowds for a single vacancy.
